definition: A decorative circular arrangement made of various types of plants or flowers, typically worn on the head as an adornment for special occasions or festivals. It is commonly associated with traditional cultural events and symbolizes beauty, celebration, or a connection with nature.

examples.german: Sie trug einen Blumenkranz im Haar.
examples.english: She wore a flower crown in her hair.
The flower wreath was intricately woven.

examples.german: Die Brautjungfern trugen alle einen Blumenkranz.
examples.english: All the bridesmaids wore a flower garland.

examples.german: Der Blumenkranz duftete herrlich nach frischen Blumen.
examples.english: The flower crown smelled wonderfully of fresh flowers.

examples.german: Sie legte den Blumenkranz auf das Grab.
examples.english: She placed the flower wreath on the grave.
